conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway/isometric interior with wall height, thickness, and visible room volume.

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms from the 2D plan are missing in the 3D render (no Activity room, Balcony, Bed 2/3/4, Bath, WC, Linen, etc.).
Layout does not match the 2D plan: 3D render shows a kitchen/dining/living area and a garage with cars, which are not present in the provided 2D plan.

summary: Although the second image is a genuine 3D cutaway, it is not a geometrically faithful transformation of the provided 2D floor plan and omits most rooms.
